topComments.author: Indrajeet Yadav
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu visitei em 23 de outubro de 2021 e felizmente tive a chance de ver a neve cair ao vivo. Porque geralmente a queda de neve ocorre de novembro a fevereiro. Voc√™ pode reservar um t√°xi compartilhado ou um viajante de tempo no mercado principal de Manali. Muitos escrit√≥rios de turismo / lojas est√£o l√°, que levam $$ 600 por pessoa e o levam a Rohtang. Pela manh√£, √†s 10h, eles ir√£o busc√°-lo no mercado principal e, √† noite, √†s 17h, retorno no mesmo ve√≠culo. No caminho voc√™ tem que levar Jaqueta de Neve Imperme√°vel e gumboot $ 250 para ambos no aluguel, porque nossas jaquetas e sapatos normais n√£o funcionam l√°, enquanto voltando √† noite voc√™ tem que devolv√™-los no mesmo lugar. Uma porta de entrada para Lahaul e Spiti Valley em Himachal Pradesh, continua sendo um dos destinos mais espetaculares de toda a regi√£o de Kullu. Esta passagem pitoresca est√° localizada a cerca de 51 km de Manali, a uma altura de 3.980 metros, na rodovia Manali Keylong. A encosta da montanha √© t√£o bonita que pessoas de todos os cantos do pa√≠s visitam este lugar para praticar esportes de aventura como esqui, patina√ß√£o no gelo, parapente, etc. O Rohtang Pass est√° aberto ao turista de abril a outubro, com permiss√£o para a viagem nesta rodovia √© fornecida pelo Ex√©rcito Indiano, uma vez que eles limpam a neve. A passagem de Rohtang √© a mesma estrada que conecta Leh Ladakh a partir de Manali. No caminho voc√™ tamb√©m pode fazer uma parada na √öLTIMA VILA de Manali na Rodovia Rohtang Pass - Kothi, para melhor vista, visite tamb√©m Gulaba e Nehru Kund.  (Original) I visited on 23rd Oct 2021 and luckily got chance to see live snow fall. Because usually snow fall occurs from Nov to Feb. You can book share taxi or tempo traveller from Manali main market. Many tourist office/shops are there who takes ‚Çπ600 per person and take you to Rohtang. Morning 10 am they will pick you from main market and evening 5 pm return in same vehicle. On the way you have to take Waterproof Snow Jacket & gumboot ‚Çπ250 for both on rent, because our normal jackets and shoes won't work there, while coming back in evening you have to return it at same place. A gateway to Lahaul and Spiti Valley in Himachal Pradesh, remains one of the most spectacular destinations in the entire Kullu region. This picturesque pass is located around 51 kms away from Manali, at a height of 3980 meters, on Manali Keylong highway. This mountain slope is so beautiful that people from every corner of the country visit this place to take part in adventure sports such as skiing, ice-skating, paragliding, etc. The Rohtang Pass is open for tourist from April to October and the permission to travel on this highway is given by the Indian Army, once they clear the snow. The Rohtang Pass is the same road, which connects to Leh Ladakh from Manali. On the you can also take a stop at Manali's LAST VILLAGE on Rohtang Pass Highway -¬†Kothi, for best view, also visit at Gulaba & Nehru Kund.

topComments.author: ANKUR GUPTA
topComments.comment: Recently visited the place and it is 55 km from manali. Here i enjoyed a superb and lifetime experience around the fresh snow. The environment is very cool and  chill and many great snow activities like yak ride, zip line, paragliding etc. And also take good pictures in the snow with your phone or on rent photographer. The road from Manali is very superb to go there and usually not much traffic apart from the permit check point. Best time to go there from april to october where you will also get the snow.

topComments.author: Unnati Kala
topComments.comment: Beautiful  place to enjoy nature and snow. We got snow there in the month of June.

Em meados de junho haver√° pouca neve. Ainda assim voc√™ pode gerenciar. Lugar muito bonito. Mas muito caro para um lugar para maggie, mesmo em um restaurante 5 estrelas üòÇ. topComments.author: AKASH SHEORAN
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Estive aqui duas vezes agora e √© t√£o maravilhoso quanto antes. Eu visitei em junho de 2019 quando havia gelo por toda parte e depois visitei em setembro de 2021 e n√£o havia gelo. Os n√≠veis de oxig√™nio s√£o um pouco baixos e pode haver alguma dificuldade para visitantes antigos e de primeira viagem. Paisagens alucinantes s√£o a USP de Manali, Rohtang Pass e √°reas pr√≥ximas. A gente est√° sempre em Aww... da beleza que ele est√° observando atrav√©s de seus olhos e tem vontade de nunca mais voltar para as cidades polu√≠das de onde viemos. √Ågua azul do rio pingando da montanha. Eu definitivamente recomendo este lugar √© lindo.  (Original) I had been here two times now and it is as wonderful as it was before. I visited in June 2019 when there was Ice all over and then I visited in September in 2021 and there was no ice. Oxygen levels are somewhat low and there can be some difficulty for old and first time visitor. Mind blowing landscapes is the USP of Manali, Rohtang Pass and nearby area. One is always in Aww... of the beauty he is observing through his eyes and feels like to never go back to polluted cities we came from. Blue Water of river dripping from the mountain. I definitely recommend this place its beautiful.

Lugar lindo para fotografar e brincar com a neve. a maioria das pessoas costuma fazer parapente do Rotang Pass  (Original) CAUTION  If you don't want to stuck in the traffic during holydays so bring a bike to  reach up Rotang pass. if your taking your car so leave earlier from Manali . bring snow cloths and food , cause you don't find anything at Rotang pass. Reautiful place for photography and playing with snow. most people use to do paragliding from Rotang pass

topComments.author: Sharmeen Khan
topComments.comment: Exceptionally beautiful. Covered in fresh snow after snowfall a day before we went, we could enjoy all the activities and have great fun. Toilets available at Marhi only. Hawkers selling tea, coffee and Maggi at Rohtang. Stay hydrated at all times.

topComments.author: Jasminder S Rooprai
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A experi√™ncia de viajar na passagem de Rohtang pela rota antiga, enquanto a partida e o retorno pelo t√∫nel atul √© excelente e memor√°vel. Em nossa visita, o Sr. Presidente da √çndia teve que visitar alguns de seus prop√≥sitos oficiais. ent√£o contratamos uma lata de 14 lugares com o motorista local (um tipo de homem amig√°vel e menos falador que j√° vi com a melhor √©tica de condu√ß√£o). as estradas est√£o bloqueadas devido √† visita do presidente, ent√£o nosso motorista pegou a rota antiga que as pessoas usavam antes do t√∫nel de atul ser feito. Os n√≠veis de oxig√™nio da altura s√£o baixos, meu filho vomitou devido a isso. mas depois gostamos das cenas. n√≥s costum√°vamos optar por rota para spiti valley tamb√©m.. da√≠ n√≥s viajamos e verificamos algumas estradas de spiti valley, ent√£o tivemos a sorte de retornar pelo t√∫nel atul. come√ßamos nossa jornada √†s 6h da manh√£ e voltamos √†s 12h30 em Manali no nosso hotel. A multid√£o e os movimentos de ve√≠culos, o tr√°fego √© enorme e em alta devido a esse tempo. mas curti muito. Rohtang pass / La, deve ser visitado apenas com personals locais, porque eles guiam melhor.  (Original) The experience of traveling at Rohtang pass via old route while departure and return via atul tunnel is outstanding and memorable. On our visit Mr president of india had to visit for some of there official purpose. so we hire a 14seater can with the local driver,( A kind of friendly and less talkative man i ve seen with best driving ethics). the roads are blocked due to president visit, so our driver took old route which people used before atul tunnel was made. The oxygen levels of the height is low, my son puked due to this. but after that we enjoyed the scenes. we used to opt route for spiti valley too.. hence we travelled and checked some roads of spiti valley, then got lucky to return via atul tunnel. we started our journey by morning 6am and we returned by 12.30pm in manali at our hotel. The crowd and vehicle movements, traffic is huge and at high side due that time. but enjoyed a alot. Rohtang pass / La, should be visited with local personals only, because they do guide best.

topComments.author: Mehul Aswad
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Em pir panjal , Rohtang Pass √© bastante famoso entre os viajantes de Ladakh, mas a avalanche imprevis√≠vel e as condi√ß√µes clim√°ticas severas o tornam assustador algumas vezes. No entanto, tornou o passeio dos aventureiros por Ladakh alucinante. Uma passagem de alta montanha a uma altitude de 3.978 metros acima do n√≠vel do mar, Rohtang fica a apenas 51 km de Manali. Faz parte da orgulhosa cordilheira Pir Panjal do poderoso Himalaia e √© um dos¬†lugares famosos de Kullu.  (Original) In pir panjal , Rohtang Pass is quite famous among Ladakh travelers but the unpredictable avalanche and severe climatic conditions make it scary some times. Nonetheless, it had made adventure seekers‚Äô tour of Ladakh mind-blowing. A high mountain pass at an elevation of 3978 meters above the sea level, Rohtang is just 51 km from Manali. It is a part of the proud Pir Panjal Range of the mighty Himalayas and it is one of the¬†Kullu famous places.

topComments.comment: I have visited some places but this would be the Best Place on earth  that I have visited !  The view is mesmerizing . ! Go early in morning to avoid rush and crowd . The view from the top is Beautiful , You can do several snow activities . I loved this place a lot . !
